wikitext.*:
<noinclude>Only for [[强迫症]]</noinclude><includeonly><!--{if !isset($wgqiangpozheng) || !$wgqiangpozheng}--><!--{assign var="wgqiangpozheng" value=true scope="global"}--><script>
window.RLQ = window.RLQ || [];
window.RLQ.push(function() {
    $(function() {
        var date = new Date();
        if (date.getDate() === 1 && date.getMonth() === 3 && $('body').is('.page-Mainpage')) $('body').addClass('foolish');
        if (!$('body').is('.page-Mainpage.foolish, .page-Template_首页_专题_愚人节_2018, .page-强迫症')) return;
        setInterval(function() {
            var group = $();
            group = group.add($('#mw-head [id^="p-"]'));
            group = group.add($('#mw-head [id^="pt-"]'));
            group = group.add($('#mw-panel [id^="n-"]'));
            group = group.add($("#firstHeading"));
            group = group.add($("#siteSub"));
            group = group.add($("#mw-content-text > .mw-parser-output > *:not(#mf-centercontainer)"));
            group = group.add($("body.mainpage #mw-content-text > .mw-parser-output #mainpage > [id^='mainpage-']"));
            group = group.add($("body.mainpage #mw-content-text > .mw-parser-output #mainpage > [class^='mainpage-']"));
            group = group.add($("catlinks > *"));
            group = group.add($("#mw-data-after-content"));
            group = group.add($('[id^="comment"]'));
            group = group.add($("#footer-info-lastmod"));
            group = group.add($("#footer-moegirl > ul > *"));
            group = group.add($(".copyright"));
            group = group.add($("#footer-places > *"));
            group = group.add($("#footer-icons > *"));
            group = group.add($("#heimu_toggle, .backToTop"));
            group = group.not('.fixtheobsession');
            if (group[0]) group.each(function(i) {
                var deg = $(this).width() < ($(window).width() / 2) ? 2 : 1;
                $(this).addClass('fixtheobsession').css('transform', 'rotate(' + (i % 2 ? "-" : "") + deg + 'deg)');
                if ($(this).closest('#mw-content-text, [id^="comment"]')[0] && deg === 1) {
                    var margin = $(this).width() * 0.02 + 'px';
                    $(this).css('margin-top', margin).css('margin-bottom', margin);
                }
            });
        }, 1000);
    });
});
</script>
<style>
body.page-强迫症,
body.page-强迫症 *,
body.page-Template_首页_专题_愚人节_2018,
body.page-Template_首页_专题_愚人节_2018 *,
body.mainpage.foolish,
body.mainpage.foolish * {
    cursor: wait !important;
}
</style><!--{/if}--></includeonly>
